description: Template configuration for this project. See https://www.codebuff.com/config for all options.

fileChangeHooks.name: backend-unit-tests
fileChangeHooks.command: set -o pipefail && find src -name '*.test.ts' ! -name '*.integration.test.ts' | sort | xargs -I {} ../.bin/bun test {} 2>&1 | grep -Ev '✓|\(pass\)'

fileChangeHooks.name: npm-app-unit-tests
fileChangeHooks.command: set -o pipefail && find src -name '*.test.ts' ! -name '*.integration.test.ts' | sort | xargs -I {} ../.bin/bun test {} 2>&1 | grep -Ev '✓|\(pass\)'

fileChangeHooks.name: common-unit-tests
fileChangeHooks.command: set -o pipefail && find src -name '*.test.ts' ! -name '*.integration.test.ts' | sort | xargs -I {} ../.bin/bun test {} 2>&1 | grep -Ev '✓|\(pass\)'

fileChangeHooks.name: prettier-format
fileChangeHooks.command: git diff --name-only --diff-filter=ACMR | grep -E '\.(ts|tsx|json|md)$' | xargs -r npx prettier --write
